span.strong: Open enrollment for all students began Monday, February 1st

p.strong:
Allen Village School is now accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year.
Applications are available online.
Due to CDC guidelines, completed applications for grades PreK - 12 should be scanned and emailed totcobbins@allenvillageschool.com

span.strong: High School Essay (mandatory for all new high school students)

a.title: Go to comments for Enrollment for 2020-2021

span.span: Feel free to complete and submit an application for employment for the 2020-21 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Staff Applications for 2020-2021

span.p: Vaccination is mandatory and is required for students entering the 8th, 9th, and 12thgrader this school year.
